page.title: 03FARMS AROUND EAST ALLINGTON
page.content: 86% of the farms we surveyed were owned, 9% were managed and 5% were tenants. 90% of the farms employed farmworkers and 10% used casual labour. 68% do not have any cottages on their farms.27% have cottages which they do not let and 5% let their cottages.95% owned tractors and 36% also owned a combine.All the farms surveyed owned a radio,95% had a television,18% owned a video recorder,10% had a computer, 95% have fridges and deep freezes, 41% owned a tumble drier and l00% had a washing machine and a telephone. 36% had a dish washer.Heating was in various forms, solid fuel being the most popular at 59%,l8% used solid fuel and electricity, 9% used solid fuel and oil, 9% were all electric and 5% used oil only.
